job.title: Sr. Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtJob Summary ltpgtltpgtltbrgt ltpgtltpgtWhistic is growing and were looking for an experienced Sr Software Engineer FullStack to join our Engineering team You are joining Whistic at an exciting time You have the ability to come in and have a large impact on the continued development of the Whistic platform ltpgtltpgtYou will be responsible for developing vertical slices of functionality across all phases of the product development cycle Youll also have the opportunity to shape and execute exciting projects Our engineers need to be versatile display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the fullstack as we continue to push technology forward ltpgtltpgtampnbsp ltpgtltpgtKey Responsibilities ampnbsp ltpgtltbrgtltulgtltligtltpgtDevelop software solutions by studying information needs conferring with users studying systems flow data usage and work processes investigating problem areas following the software development lifecycle ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtDetermine operational feasibility by evaluating analysis problem definition requirements solution development and proposed solutions ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtDocument and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation flowcharts layouts diagrams charts code comments and clear code ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtPrepare and install solutions by determining and designing system specifications standards and programming ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtImprove operations by conducting systems analysis recommending changes in policies and procedures ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtUpdate job knowledge by studying stateoftheart development tools programming techniques and computing equipment participating in educational opportunities reading professional publications maintaining personal networks participating in professional organizations ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtProtect operations by keeping information confidential ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtProvide information by collecting analyzing and summarizing development and service issues ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtAccomplish engineering and organization mission by completing related results as needed ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtSupport and develop peer engineers by providing advice coaching and mentorship opportunities ltpgtltligtltulgtltpgtampnbsp ltpgtltpgtTech Qualifications ltpgtltpgtltbrgt ltpgtltulgtltligtltpgtJava 8 Spring Boot 15 Spring Data REST Angular Javascript JSON XML Jenkins SQL ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtEnterprise Systems microServices SaaS ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtAWS preferred ltpgtltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgt ltpgtltpgtOther Skills and Qualifications ltpgtltbrgtltulgtltligtltpgtAt least 7 years of proven experience as a Software Engineer or Developer ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtBachelors Degree in Computer Science or related preferred ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtTech startup experience preferred ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtAnalyzing Information ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtSoftware design documentation and testing ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtAbility to work in a team environment ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtSoftware Development process and  fundamentals ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtSoftware architecture ltpgtltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgt ltpgtltpgtBenefits ltpgtltpgtltbrgt ltpgtltulgtltligtltpgtStock options ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtMedical dental and vision insurance benefit ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtPaid parental leave ltpgtltligtltligtltpgt401K ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtCompetitive salary and bonus ltpgtltligtltligtltpgt16 Paid Holidays ltpgtltligtltligtltpgt15 Days PTO ltpgtltligtltligtltpgt2 Whistic DNA Days ltpgtltligtltligtltpgtSummer Fridays ltpgtltligtltulgtltpgtampnbsp ltpgtltpgtAbout Whistic ltpgtltpgtltbrgt ltpgtltpgtWhistic is on a mission to become the single source of trust for buyers and sellers by enabling companies to hold each other accountable for protecting their shared data Heres how it works When a company is seeking out a vendor that will have access to its sensitive data that company must assess the vendor to ensure it meets certain information security thresholds This assessment process results in cumbersome clunky and slow spreadsheets emailed back and forth back and fortheating up info security resources and ultimately delaying deals ltpgtltpgtampnbsp ltpgtltpgtThats where Whistic comes in Our gamechanging 2sided platform enables security and sales teams to proactively conduct and respond to third party security assessments by streamlining and automating the process transforming the work for companies all over the world ltpgtltpgtltemgtampnbspltemgt ltpgtltpgtltemgtWhistic is an Equal Opportunity Employerltemgtltpgt
